original_text: When the Israelite soldiers had finished chasing and killing the Philistines, they returned. They went into the Philistines' camp and they took their things for themselves.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 블레셋 사람들을 쫓다가 돌아와서 그들의 진영을 노략하였고

sentences.original_text: When the Israelite soldiers had finished chasing
They went into the Philistines' camp
and they took their things for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들의 물건들을 자신들을 위해 가져갔다
